alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:10PM CDT until May 19 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLLIN COUNTY... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lowry Crossing, or 7 miles north of Wylie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McKinney, Allen, Wylie, Murphy, Fairview, Princeton, Lucas, Parker, Farmersville, Lowry Crossing, Lavon, St. Paul, Nevada, Josephine, New Hope, Altoga, Branch, Lavon Lake and Copeville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
